bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: avoid handling and moving any box
rules.2: when place a soft object, the elastic object must be in the bin
rules.3: when place a rigid objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
rules.4: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object first
